projects.title: Eva Platformer
projects.description: Eva Platformer is a platformer game where you collect coins and keys. You play as the main character Eva. Gather all the coins and fight the enemies.

projects.title: AlekseyKonCrypt

projects.title: Character Alyona
projects.description: Character Alyona, as well as work in spine 2d. The character is made in anime style and consists of many layers. For animation is used skeletal structure with elaborate hierarchy of bones and adjustment of weights.

projects.title: This Website
projects.description: This website is built using React, js, i18next for multilingual support, and tailwind css. The layout is implemented using CSS modules to ensure style isolation.

projects.title: HB Project
projects.description: HB Project is an unrealized project, on Hellua Boss. As part of the development, several animated characters, backgrounds and menu interface were created.
